item.title: First-Level Support Agent with Microsoft Copilot Studio – AI-powered Ticket Handling in Microsoft 365
item.description: Build an autonomous first-level support agent with Microsoft Copilot Studio and integrate it into a ticket system based on SharePoint, Power Apps and Power Automate. The agent answers standard questions, uses a defined knowledge base and reliably hands over complex cases to human colleagues.

item.title: Ticket System with SharePoint, Power Apps and Power Automate – incl. Automated Status Workflow
item.description: Build a flexible ticket system with SharePoint, Power Apps and Power Automate. Includes status model, module ownership, automated workflow, trigger conditions and form. Ideal for IT teams and internal services.

item.title: Digital Vacation Planning with SharePoint, Power Apps & Power Automate – Complete Approval Process Step by Step
item.description: Create a complete digital vacation planning solution, including approval workflow, using SharePoint, Power Apps, and Power Automate. Includes vacation overview, day calculation, calendar views, and automated approvals – ideal for IT departments and management.
